content: Is there a way to check that a test generates a given file? I want it to be a UI test so I can use revisions, but I can make it run-make if that's not possible.
I'm wondering what exactly you're trying to accomplish though, it's possible a run pass test could do it

simulacrum said:

I'm wondering what exactly you're trying to accomplish though, it's possible a run pass test could do it

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/83478/
Hm, I'll leave a comment on the PR
boy, you picked a hell of a can of worms to decide to review :laughing:
